channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins HTTP Request Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins HTTP Request Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-36901|2024-08-03T10:14:29.477Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20http%20request%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins HTTP Request Plugin 1.15 and earlier stores HTTP Request passwords unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins controller where they can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system.
